CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Phone Screen stage positioned above or below the Technical Interview stage?
SRP.A: The Phone Screen stage is positioned {above} the Technical Interview stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage HR Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage HR Interview is {50%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Technical Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage Technical Interview is {22%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Offer Extended?
VE.A: The value of stage Offer Extended is {18%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Phone Screen, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Offer Extended, with a value of {18%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended is {4%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview is {28%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Phone Screen to stage HR Interview?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Phone Screen to stage HR Interview is {50%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 75%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 20%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 20% and 36%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended, or from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {HR Interview} to {Technical Interview} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended, from stage Phone Screen to HR Interview, or from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Phone Screen} to stage {HR Interview} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Phone Screen} and {HR Interview} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Technical Interview} and {Offer Extended} stages.
